## What we have learned {.smaller}

**Quarto**

- How to create, edit and render Quarto documents
- How to use and configure code-chunks
- How to create presentations using the revealjs format

**Jupyter**

- How to document and run code in Jupyter notebooks
- How to use Jupyter `magics`
- How to define and use interactive widgets
- Special considerations for working reproducibly with Jupyter notebooks
- How to convert and render Jupyter notebooks

## Comparison

| | Quarto | Jupyter |
| --- | --- | --- |
| underlying format | markdown | json |
| code execution | code chunks | cells |
| user interface | command line | web browser |
| way of working | render top to bottom | interactive |
